text.en: Through this virtue, may all beings throughout the whole of space
text.en-trans: gewa di yi khakhyab dro kün gyi

text.en: Be freed from every form of physical and mental discomfort,
text.en-trans: lü dang sem kyi zukngu kün sal né

text.en: And may they attain the level of the sovereign of physicians,
text.en-trans: duk sum gyundré né sel lanamé

text.en: The unsurpassed cure for the three poisons, cause and result.
